description:
Learn all about Sparklines: the tiny little graphs that you can embed in just one cell.

Ever found yourself in a puzzle, where though you want to display a graph representing the data alongside the data, but wanted the audience to focus on the data? Well then Sparklines are for you.

You can add these pattern identifying graphs for each range of data in just one cell. This will help your audience analyze the trend, while they're witnessing the data.

Sparklines is a relatively new concept for Excel users. Therefore, I have designed this course to divulge the basics of Sparklines and Sparkline Groups. Once you're up to speed with the basic, the second section discusses the advanced features offered by sparklines. At the end of that section, I assure, you'll be able to use any basic or advanced feature, any which way!

Shall we begin!!!
title: Excel 2013: Master Sparklines in 30 min
